         "summary": "Resolve repetitive tasks with simple, text-based commands from a command line interface with Appfire's Atlassian Command Line Interface (CLI)."
       }
     ]
  ⎿  PostToolUse:Bash hook succeeded

∴ Thinking…

  Vidím že:
  1. ACLI je od Atlassianu (oficiální)
  2. Appfire má jak Jira CLI, Confluence CLI, tak Bitbucket CLI
  3. Existuje "Bitbucket Cloud CLI"

  Teď potřebuji zjistit:
  1. ACLI - Confluence a Bitbucket support, comment editing
  2. Appfire CLI - všechny produkty

  Zkusím získat více informací o ACLI z README.

● Bash(zai-cli read "https://www.atlassian.com/blog/jira/atlassian-command-line-interface" --clean | jq -r '.content' > /tmp/acli-blog.md && wc -l /tmp/acli-blog.md)

  ⎿  PostToolUse:Bash hook succeeded

∴ Thinking…

  Našel jsem:
  1. ACLI homebrew repo - oficiální od Atlassianu
  2. gajira-cli - deprecated GitHub Actions
  3. confluence-cli - third party Confluence CLI
  4. atlassian-cli (terabyte) - Ruby CLI toolkit

  Teď si přečtu blog post o ACLI abych pochopal co umí.

● Read(/tmp/acli-blog.md)
  ⎿  Read 37 lines
  ⎿  PostToolUse:Callback hook succeeded: Success

● github - Get file or directory contents (MCP)(owner: "atlassian", path: "README.md", repo: "homebrew-acli")
  ⎿  PreToolUse:mcp__github__get_file_contents hook succeeded: Success
  ⎿  successfully downloaded text file (SHA: b7b01a51fcdd823edff380a5e8ab73c899e14f25)
  ⎿  [Resource from github at repo://atlassian/homebrew-acli/ca43ee352f27bdda7d63973aa91ee1f13e76bbac/contents/README.md] # ACLI Homebrew Tap

     [![Atlassian license](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-Apache%202.0-blue.svg?style=flat-square)](LICENSE)[![Go
     Reference](https://pkg.go.dev/badge/github.com/spf13/cobra.svg)](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/spf13/cobra)

     A custom tap for [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/).

     Atlassian Command-Line Interface (ACLI or Atlassian CLI) is a powerful software tool that allows you to interact with your
     Atlassian products directly through your keyboard. It is designed to enhance control, efficiency, and cost-effectiveness
     across all your Atlassian products. Streamline your workflow and save valuable time by reducing the risk of errors
     associated with manual operations.

     ## Installation

     Via Homebrew

     ```shell
     $ brew tap atlassian-labs/acli

     $ brew install acli
     ```

     ## License

     Copyright (c) 2025 Atlassian US., Inc.
     Apache 2.0 licensed, see [LICENSE](LICENSE) file.

     <br/>

     [![With â¤ï¸ from Atlassian](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/atlassian-internal/oss-assets/master/banner-cheers.png)](https://www.atlassian.com)

  ⎿  PostToolUse:mcp__github__get_file_contents hook succeeded
